 ¾ Remove any visible obstruction or foreign body from her mouth.
 ¾ Keep a padded mouth gag between the upper and lower jaw to prevent tongue bite (do not attempt this 
during a convulsion).
 ¾ Keep her in the left lateral position.
 ¾ Refer and accompany the woman to the FRU, if possible. Manage any convulsions that may occur on the 
way.
c. Health and Nutritional Counselling 
Counselling messages for pregnant women:
